title: Font ID - The color and the shape
content:
[http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q84/djhelenk/colorandshape.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141117110213/http:/i134.photobucket.com/albums/q84/djhelenk/colorandshape.jpg "http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q84/djhelenk/colorandshape.jpg")

Hi there! Me and my friend are looking for this font but we don't know what's it called. Could anybody help? There are many similars so it's sort of trapper. It would be great to hear if anyone has the smallest clue. Thanks a lot!

x

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [colorandshape.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141117110213/http:/typophile.com/files/colorandshape.jpg) | 56.48 KB |
author: icantgetenough

comments.content: Looks like a customized version of [Supper Club JNL](http://web.archive.org/web/20141117110213/http:/www.identifont.com/show?NKQ) from Jeff Levine. Only »e« and »t« differ …

The background on Jeff's font says he adapted the lower case from a font of Ray Larabie's (with agreement from Ray). That font appears to be [Misirlou](http://web.archive.org/web/20141117110213/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/misirlou/), which matches your sample exactly.

- Mike Yanega
